title: Bloodlines: A Tale from the Heart of Africa
description: Cathy Grant, the intrepid young peace corps volunteer from The Temporary Natives, discovers a terrifying lesson in the history of her Central African post; of a country imprisoned in a madman's grip; of a dictator who pitted brother against brother, and who caused the deaths of hundreds in the name of power. And, against this tale is hung a greater story of survival, hope and love.
author: Cindy Goff
